content:
Here are the UI elements required for Scenario 1: "Search for images using keywords":

1. Search bar: A text input field where the user can enter the keyword for the search.
2. Search button: A button that initiates the search when clicked.
3. Results list: A section that displays the search results as a list of images.
4. Image thumbnail: A reduced version of each image in the search results, which provides a preview of the full image.
5. Image title: A text label displaying a brief description of the image.
6. View button: A button that allows the user to view the full image.
7. Save button: A button that allows the user to save the image to one of their boards.
8. Share button: A button that allows the user to share the image on social media or via a direct link.
9. Loading indicator: A visual element that indicates when the search results are being loaded.
10. Error message: A message that informs the user if there was an error with the search, such as no results found or a network error.
